scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder comprises letters to John Wesley Hunt of Lexington, Kentucky; a land transfer giving Joshua Cates 14 acres in Christian County, Kentucky; Thomas Ewen, John Wesley Hunt, and Abijah Hunt's bill with the clerk of the Pulaski Circuit Court; and a land indenture documenting Andrew and Martha McCalla's sale of a tract of land in Fayette County, Kentucky, to John W. Hunt. Letters discuss money, tobacco orders, John D. Clifford's damaged reputation, bank notes, and the delicate health of Pearson Hunt's wife.
